name: NOVA-XMD
description: Whatsapp bot ü§ñ by nova xmd tech

PREFIX.description: paste your bot prefix note! Don't apply null prefix.

MODE.description: select your bot work type public-private-inbox-group.

ANTI_DELETE.description: set true for show deleted messages.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Make it true if want always online.

AUTO_REPLY.description: Make it true if you want automatic reply.

AUTO_STICKER.description: Make it true if you want automatic sticker.

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Make it true for automatic status seen.

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: make it true for automatic status reaction or like.

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Make it true for auto reply msg on status seen.

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Type custom message on status reply

OWNER_NUMBER.description: put the owner number for bot.

ANTI_LINK.description: Make it true if you want bot auto remove group link.

ANTI_LINK_KICK.description: Make it true if you want bot auto remove group link.

ANTI_BAD.description: Make it true if you want bot auto delete bad words.

MENTION_REPLY.description: make it true if want mention reply if someone menetion you.

MENU_IMAGE_URL.description: add url for mention reply and menu if want.

DESCRIPTION.description: add caption for menu and other

DELETE_LINKS.description: remove links from group automatically without removing member

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Make it true if you want auto recoding.

AUTO_TYPING.description: Make it true if you want auto typing.

AUTO_REACT.description: Make it true if you want react on every message.

CUSTOM_REACT.description: Make it true if you want custom reactions.

CUSTOM_REACT_EMOJIS.description: put here custom react react emojis.

ANTI_DEL_PATH.description: change it to -same- if you want to resend deleted message in same chat othwise inbox

ADMIN_EVENTS.description: make it true if want know who promote or demote a member .

WELCOME.description: make it true if want goodbye and welcome message in groups.

ANTICALL.description: Make it true if you want bot to block incoming calls.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Make it true if you want bot read your all sms just now.

name: B.M.B-TECH
description: ô·¥ás·¥õ ·¥° ú·¥Ä·¥õs·¥Ä·¥ò·¥ò  ô·¥è·¥õ ·¥Ö·¥á·¥†·¥á ü·¥è·¥ò·¥á·¥Ö  ô è  ô·¥ç ô ·¥õ·¥á·¥Ñ ú üáπüáø

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically(type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be download automatically and send to you(type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_READ.description: Your contact  will be read messages automatically(type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_REACT.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto react

ANTICALL.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto reject calls

AUTO_REACT_STATUS.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto like status

PM_PERMIT.description: Other user can't use your bot in pm (type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

BOT_NAME.description: put A name for your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: add one or many link for your bot menu  ; eg : url1,url2,url3.....

PUBLIC_MODE.description: type yes to put your bot on public mode or no to put it on private mod

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: insert your heroku api-key (this is optionnal)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: insert your heroku APP NAME (put the name you put on top)

SESSION_ID.description: put your session ID , the code you receive after scanning Qr code

NUMERO_OWNER.desc: Your number , dont put '+' and put you area code(exemple of kenya '254')

WARN_COUNT.desc: this is the limit of warn for warning commandes

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: if you don't want startting-bot-message put no else put yes

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: 1 online. 2 typing a message. 3 recording . Or leave the field blank to indicate your real state.

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: if you want to enable anti delete message put yes else put no

CHAT_BOT.description: Turn on the chatbot reply system (yes = active, no = deactive)

AUDIO_CHAT_BOT.description: Enable audio response in chatbot (yes = active, no = deactive)

AUTO_BIO.description: Enable automatic bio update (yes = active, no = deactive)
